section.title: size_t SDDriver::readBlocksNoDMA (size_t startSec, size_t blocks, void *buffer)
section.para:
实现与图表稍微有区别，主要是初次读时，Buffer Read Ready状态可能没有设置
参数
startSec
blocks
buffer
返回:

section.title: CommandStatus SDDriver::readPolled (uint32_t arg, uint32_t blkCnt, uint8_t *buff)
SDDriver::CommandStatus SDDriver::transferCommand (uint32_t cmd, uint32_t arg, uint32_t blckCnt)
size_t SDDriver::writeBlocksNoDMA (size_t startSec, size_t blocks, const void *buffer)
section.para:
参考 misc\external\mmc\xilinx_sd_read_write\NonDMA_Data_Transaction_3.png 注意，在QEMU下，当写入多个扇区时，必须保证物理文件具有blocks个扇区，否则可能产生TimeOutError
参数
startSec
blocks
buffer
返回:
